Central Bank of the Comros (Arabic, French) bụ etiti ụlọ akụ nke Comoros, otu agwaetiti dị n'Oké Osimiri India.
Iwu nke BCC na-ekwu na ndị nduzi ya ga-enwe ndị otu asatọ ahọpụtara site na Gọọmentị Comorian, French Central Bank (Banque de France) na gọọmentị France
Osote onye isi oche nke Central Bank nke Comoros bụ onye ọrụ Banque de France, bụ onye na-ahụ maka amụma ego
Kemgbe 19 Nọvemba 1999, ọnụ ahịa ụlọ akụ etiti niile abanyela na Euro Overnight Index Index (EONIA) na-eduga na nkwụsi ike nke ọmụrụ nwa dị iche na euro.
BCC na-etinye usoro nchekwa iwu (pasenti iri atọ nke nkwụnye ego) na usoro nlekota ụlọ akụ
Isi ụlọ ọrụ ahụ dị na Moroni.

Usoro ụlọ akụ nke Comorian bụ ụlọ akụ isii dị iche iche: Central Bank (BCC);  ndị Banque pour l'Industrie et pour le Commerce-Comores (BIC-C), na Banque de Développement des Comores (BDC), na Banque Fédérale de Commerce (BFC), na Exim Bank Comores SA na Société Nationale des Postes et des Ọrụ ego (SNPSF)
Na mgbakwunye, ụlọ akụ nchekwa ego abụọ (SANDUK na MECK) na-ekere òkè.
Otu n'ime ọrụ nke Central Bank of the Comoros bụ ịnakwere nguzobe nke ụlọ akụ ọhụrụ n'agwaetiti atọ nke Union of Comoros (Grande-Comore, Anjouan na Mohéli).
A na-ahọpụta gọvanọ maka afọ ise.
